channel.title: DEEPSOULFULHOUSE PLUS Podcast
channel.description: A Mix of Deepsoulful Gospel House Jazz Hip-Hop Rare Grooves World and Classics
channel.itunes:subtitle: Give it a listen! "Respect The Music"
channel.itunes:author: DJ Soul Heaven
channel.itunes:summary: A Mix of Deepsoulful Gospel House Jazz Hip-Hop Rare Grooves World and Classics

item.title: Episode 2 Back From The Past
item.description: Hey Guys, Hope you have a wonderful time where ever you are at home, Handing out with family,friends or at the beach. Enjoy my mixes. Any Feedback or concerns email me at djsoulheaven@gmail.com kerri chandler – the drive kerri chandler – kong dj rasoul – candlelight affair kinky movement – safe house jimpster – a hold on your soul kimouts – down to earth (monterrey wash remix 1) tiefschwarz – original (drama society remix) jay shepheard – 4nc kimouts – down to earth (original) trentemøller – miss you soul clap – the giraffe (original mix) jerome syndenham, texu, romantic couch – ebian (samual l session remix) jon cutler & matthias heilbronn – 651 (original mix) ray charles – eleanor rigby (quentin harris remix) jay shepheard – …the party’s upstairs kurd maverick – the rub (instrumental mix)
item.dc:creator: DJ Soul Heaven
item.itunes:summary:
Hey Guys, Hope you have a wonderful time where ever you are at home, Handing out with family,friends or at the beach. Enjoy my mixes. Any Feedback or concerns email me at djsoulheaven@gmail.com
kerri chandler – the drive kerri chandler – kong dj rasoul – candlelight affair kinky movement – safe house jimpster – a hold on your soul kimouts – down to earth (monterrey wash remix 1) tiefschwarz – original (drama society remix) jay shepheard – 4nc kimouts – down to earth (original) trentemøller – miss you soul clap – the giraffe (original mix) jerome syndenham, texu, romantic couch – ebian (samual l session remix) jon cutler & matthias heilbronn – 651 (original mix) ray charles – eleanor rigby (quentin harris remix) jay shepheard – …the party’s upstairs kurd maverick – the rub (instrumental mix)

item.title: Episode 1 Life is so good
item.description:
Hello, This is Deepsoul House plus coming from Nyc and your DJ is myself and i would like to thanks god for everything that i did back in the past and i'm glad and today i will be playing from deepsoul house enjoy!!!! Any feedback you can contact me djsoulheaven@gmail.com
1.Stephanie McKay-Tell It Like It Is (Dj Spinna remix) 2.Anto Vitale-Theorema Del Faya (Tea Party Vocal) 3.Dom Navarra feat Antonio-A thousand Words (Rocco Earth Mix) 4.Ananda Project-Into The Sunrise 5.Raw Artistic Soul feat Ursula Rucker-The Light (Original mix) 6.Mr A.L.I-Imagine Freedom (Dj Spinna vocal mix) 7.Jerome Sydenham & Sten Gun-OO Inimeseo 8.Kevin Yost-Like A Dream To Me 9.Akabu-I'm not Afraid of The Future (Jimpster remix) 10.From P60-I'm Not the Same 11.Larry Heard-Reminisce (Kaito Vocal Remix)
item.dc:creator: DJ Soul Heaven
item.itunes:summary:
Hello, This is Deepsoul House plus coming from Nyc and your DJ is myself and i would like to thanks god for everything that i did back in the past and i'm glad and today i will be playing from deepsoul house enjoy!!!! Any feedback you can contact me djsoulheaven@gmail.com
